project_name.justification: The text repeatedly refers to the project as the 'Northern Lights Copper Project', for example: 'Global Copper Corp. is pleased to announce that it has initiated a property-wide soil and rock geochemical sampling survey on its 100%-owned, 485 hectare Northern Lights Copper Project (the "Project") in Nevada.'

company_name.justification: The press release is issued by 'Global Copper Corp. (TSXV: CUCU) (FSE: WD9) ("Global Copper" or the "Company")' and it states the project is its '100%-owned Northern Lights Copper Project'.

ceo_buyer.justification: The contact information for Global Copper Corp., the owner of the project, lists 'Stephen Dunn, CEO and Director'.

interest_acquired_percent.justification: No interest was acquired in this transaction. The text states that the Northern Lights project is already '100%-owned' by Global Copper Corp.

primary_commodity.justification: The project is explicitly named the 'Northern Lights Copper Project' and the text discusses copper mineralization, such as 'copper mineralization grading 3% to 12% Cu'.

verified_article_link.justification: The article is a press release from Global Copper Corp. detailing exploration activities on its Northern Lights Copper Project. The source link is provided at the end of the text: 'To view the source version of this press release, please visit https://www.newsfilecorp.com/release/225197'.

currency.justification: No financial transactions or payments are mentioned in relation to the Northern Lights project. The financial details provided are for the separate option agreement on the Silver Vista Property.

cash_payments_raw.justification: The cash payments mentioned (e.g., '$10,000', '$20,000') are part of the option agreement to acquire the 'Silver Vista Property', not the Northern Lights project.

share_payments_raw.justification: The share issuance mentioned is part of the option agreement to acquire the 'Silver Vista Property', not the Northern Lights project.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: No combined payment value is mentioned for the Northern Lights project. The payments described are for the separate Silver Vista Property acquisition.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: The issuance of '4,000,000 common share' is part of the option agreement to acquire the 'Silver Vista Property', not the Northern Lights project.

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: The text does not mention any share warrant payments.

option_payments_raw.justification: The text does not mention any option payments.

issued_share_price.justification: The 'deemed price of $0.05 per Common Share' is associated with the share issuance for the acquisition of the 'Silver Vista Property', not the Northern Lights project.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: The text does not mention a specific exploration commitment in meters for the Northern Lights project.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The requirement to 'incur $100,000 in expenditures on the Property' is for the 'Silver Vista Property', not the Northern Lights project.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: The '2% net smelter return royalty' mentioned is on the 'Silver Vista Property', not the Northern Lights project.

coverage_area_raw.justification: The text states: 'The property consists of 58 lode mining claims covering 1200 acres (485 hectares)...'

coverage_area_unit.justification: The text states: 'The property consists of 58 lode mining claims covering 1200 acres (485 hectares)...'

resource_size.justification: The text indicates that no formal resource has been defined, stating: 'The project is currently in the early exploration phase but planned drilling will confirm the grade, thickness and downdip extent of the mineralization confirmed at the surface.'

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The company that owns the project, Global Copper Corp., is identified with the ticker and exchange in the first paragraph: 'Global Copper Corp. (TSXV: CUCU) (FSE: WD9)'.
